pages.text: Solidified demon will in crystalline form. This decorative pillar serves as a valid CRYSTAL component for Tier 6 Blood Altars.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Altar Component:$() Functions as a CRYSTAL block for altar construction$(br2)$(bold)Tier 6 Altar:$() Required for the highest tier Blood Altar$(br2)See the $(l:animus:tier6_altar)Tier 6 Altar$() entry for full construction details.$(br2)$(italic)Will made manifest.$()
